scripts.build: npm run build:babel:commonjs && npm run build:babel:esmodules && npm run build:typescript:commonjs && npm run build:typescript:esmodules
scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix && npm run bump:babel
scripts.bump:babel: npm run bump:babel:commonjs && npm run bump:babel:esmodules
scripts.bump:babel:commonjs: cat babel.commonjs.config.json | jq --arg CORE_JS_VERSION `[ -f node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json ] && cat node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version || cat ../../node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version` '(.plugins[] | select(.[0] == "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime"))[1].version = $CORE_JS_VERSION' | prettier --parser json > babel.commonjs.config.json.tmp && mv babel.commonjs.config.json.tmp babel.commonjs.config.json
scripts.bump:babel:esmodules: cat babel.esmodules.config.json | jq --arg CORE_JS_VERSION `[ -f node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json ] && cat node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version || cat ../../node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/package.json | jq -r .version` '(.plugins[] | select(.[0] == "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime"))[1].version = $CORE_JS_VERSION' | prettier --parser json > babel.esmodules.config.json.tmp && mv babel.esmodules.config.json.tmp babel.esmodules.config.json
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.localPeerDependencies // {} as $L | .devDependencies // {} | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.localPeerDependencies // {} as $L | .dependencies // {} | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:eslint && npm run precommit:typescript:production && npm run precommit:typescript:test
